data.expected_result: User sidebar opens correctly/can access the server normally.
data.short_description: Mentions in the channel topic will crash iOS users trying to open the users list. Recreated on both iOS 9.3.5 and iOS 10.2, iPhone 5 and iPad Pro.
data.steps_to_repro: - On Desktop, place a mention in the channel topic of the main general channel. Use the format of <@###########> and place the mention at the bottom of the channel topic on its own line. - There must be one blank line above the meetnion as well. The mention can not be on the line immediately following the text. - Try opening the users panel in that channel on iOS, or navigating to that server right after opening the Discord app.
